welcome_message_body: Welcome to Matsubara, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and traditional culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: 加寿屋 藤井寺本店
restaurants.description: 加寿屋 藤井寺本店 is a udon restaurant located in 藤井寺市.

restaurants.name: ビッグジョー 藤井寺店
restaurants.description: ビッグジョー 藤井寺店 is a steakhouse located in 藤井寺市.

restaurants.name: 餃子の王将 外環藤井寺店
restaurants.description: 餃子の王将 外環藤井寺店 is a chinese restaurant located in 羽曳野市.

restaurants.name: ずんどう屋 藤井寺店 (ラー麺ずんどう屋 藤井寺)
restaurants.description: ずんどう屋 藤井寺店 (ラー麺ずんどう屋 藤井寺) is a ramen restaurant located in 藤井寺市.

restaurants.name: バーガーキング イズミヤ八尾店
restaurants.description: バーガーキング イズミヤ八尾店 is a fast food restaurant located in 八尾市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network after watching a short advertisement.
